location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'A Mehaleh on the Tigris.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:94 x 144 mmCondition:The print is in good condition throughout with minor toning/fading at all edges and surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘31’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This image shows a mehaleh (or mahaila) river boat under sail on the Tigris.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'A Mehaleh on the Tigris.'Pencil, above image to the right: ‘31’; ‘9’
